studyArms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment
studyArms.description: Single-arm treatment where participants receive 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days, followed by titration to 30 mg/day starting on Day 29.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '15 mg/day', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Initial treatment period at 15 mg dose'}, {'dose': '30 mg/day', 'startDay': 29, 'endDay': 40, 'description': 'Titrated dose period following Safety Review Committee confirmation'}]

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment experienced)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment naïve)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days
